channel.title: Need TUT so when u wc, you get gold instead
channel.description: Need TUT so when you woodcut, you get gold instead of Wood. Thanks! I WILL APPRECIATE THIS, A WHOOLE LOT! ;)

item.title: Need TUT so when u wc, you get gold instead
item.dc:creator: @Revolation Revolation
item.description:
@Revolation wrote:

Ugh, 100 errors, Errm thank god i have a back-up

I just saw a TUT for wc money, Can someone find plz

item.source: Need TUT so when u wc, you get gold instead

item.title: Need TUT so when u wc, you get gold instead
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

case 1282: if(HasAxeDeadTree() == true && actionTimer == 0) { addItem(1511, 1); sendMessage("You Cut A Log"); addSkillXP(10, 8); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(875); } break; case 1276: if(HasAxeTree() == true && actionTimer == 0) { addItem(1511, 1); sendMessage("You Cut A Log"); addSkillXP(20, 8); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(875); } break; case 1281: if(HasAxeOak() == true && actionTimer == 0 && playerLevel[8] >= 15) { addItem(1521, 1); sendMessage("You Cut An Oak Log"); addSkillXP(30, 8); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(875); } else if (HasAxeOak() == false) { sendMessage("You Need A Proper Axe To Cut Down This Tree"); } else if (playerLevel[8] <= 14) { sendMessage("You Need 15 Woodcutting To Cut Oak!"); } break; case 1308: if(HasAxeWillow() == true && actionTimer == 0 && playerLevel[8] >= 30) { addItem(1519, 1); sendMessage("You Cut A Willow Log"); addSkillXP(40, 8); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(875); } else if (HasAxeWillow() == false) { sendMessage("You Need A Proper Axe To Cut Down This Tree"); } else if (playerLevel[8] <= 29) { sendMessage("You Need 30 Woodcutting To Cut Willow!"); } break; case 1307: if(HasAxeMaple() == true && actionTimer == 0 && playerLevel[8] >= 45) { addItem(1517, 1); sendMessage("You Cut A Maple Log"); addSkillXP(50, 8); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(875); } else if (HasAxeMaple() == false) { sendMessage("You Need A Proper Axe To Cut Down This Tree"); } else if (playerLevel[8] <= 44) { sendMessage("You Need 45 Woodcutting To Cut Maple!"); } break; case 1309: if(HasAxeYew() == true && actionTimer == 0 && playerLevel[8] >= 60) { addItem(1515, 1); sendMessage("You Cut A Yew Log"); addSkillXP(75, 8); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(875); } else if (HasAxeYew() == false) { sendMessage("You Need A Proper Axe To Cut Down This Tree"); } else if (playerLevel[8] <= 59) { sendMessage("You Need 60 Woodcutting To Cut Yew"); } case 8396: if(HasAxeMagic() == true && actionTimer == 0 && playerLevel[8] >= 75) { addItem(1513, 1); sendMessage("You Cut A Magic Log"); addSkillXP(120, 8); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(875); } else if (HasAxeMagic() == false) { sendMessage("You Need A Proper Axe To Cut Down This Tree"); } else if (playerLevel[8] <= 74) { sendMessage("You Need 75 Woodcutting To Cut Magic"); } break;

First, Find out which tree you want to give what. Then according to the code i provided, find the case number. An example for just regular trees is 1276 so you would search for case 1276
and replace that case with this

case 1276: if(HasAxeTree() == true && actionTimer == 0) { addItem(995, 1000000); <-------------Change 1000000 to amount of cash you want. sendMessage("You Cut A Log"); addSkillXP(20, 8); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(875); } break;

Hope i helped.

Read full topic
